LanguageData.MealSurvivalPack.label: Packaged Survival Meal
LanguageData.MealSurvivalPack.description: A high-quality packaged meal, manufactured for use in survival situations。

LanguageData.MealFine.description: A complex dish assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients。
LanguageData.MealLavish.label: Lavish Meal
LanguageData.MealLavish.description: An elborate concoction of food skillfully prepared into a succulent meal。
LanguageData.MealLuxury.label: Luxury Meal
LanguageData.MealLuxury.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this meal nourishes the body, mind, and soul。
LanguageData.MealSalad.label: Fruit Salad
LanguageData.MealSalad.description: A fruit salad made from gathered fruit。
LanguageData.MealJerky.label: Jerky
LanguageData.MealJerky.description: Jerky made from raw meat.Max 5 eaten at a time。
LanguageData.RoastedMeat.label: Roasted Meat

LanguageData.FriedVegetables.description: A simple fried assortment of vegetables. Not too nutritious or tasty。

LanguageData.BakedPotato.description: A baked Potato. At least it's not raw。
